TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SystemWebCachingSectionGroup extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup
Public NotInheritable Class SystemWebCachingSectionGroup Inherits ConfigurationSectionGroup

summary.span: 对配置文件中的 组进行配置。

span.span: Configures the group within a configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一种以编程方式访问和修改配置文件的 `caching` 节的方法。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `caching` section of a configuration file. 类`caching`和部分提供对站点或应用程序的缓存机制的集中控制。The class and the `caching` section provide centralized control of the caching mechanism for a site or application. 这样就可以在不修改应用程序中单独页面的情况下, 部署、修改和禁用缓存。This makes it possible for caching to be deployed, modified, and disabled without modifying individual pages in the application. ASP.NET 缓存机制由类实现。The ASP.NET caching mechanism is implemented by the class. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET 缓存概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5ec28012-4972-4dc3-b3e8-9d20401fe11d)For more information, see [ASP.NET Caching Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5ec28012-4972-4dc3-b3e8-9d20401fe11d) 以下列表描述了两种类型的缓存 ASP.NET。The following list describes the two types of caching ASP.NET provides. - 第一种称为输出缓存, 可用于存储动态页面和用户控制响应。The first is called output caching, which allows you to store dynamic page and user control responses. 在后续请求中, 不会执行页面或用户控制代码;缓存的输出用于满足请求。On subsequent requests, the page or user control code is not executed; the cached output is used to satisfy the request. 您可以使用和属性访问输出缓存设置。You can access output caching settings using the and properties. - 第二种类型的缓存是传统的应用程序数据缓存, 可以使用它以编程方式将任意对象存储到服务器内存中, 以便您的应用程序可以节省重新创建它们所用的时间和资源。The second type of caching is traditional application data caching, which you can use to programmatically store arbitrary objects to server memory so your application can save the time and resources it takes to recreate them. 您可以使用属性访问这些缓存设置。You can access these cache settings using the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从配置文件中获取与现有 Web 应用程序关联的对象。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file associated with an existing Web application. 您可以使用此对象来访问`caching`组中包含的节。You can use this object to access the sections contained in the `caching` group. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup/CS/SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup/VB/SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.vb#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 您可以 使用方法获取类的实例。You obtain an instance of the class by using the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Cache As CacheSection
public: property System::Web::Configuration::CacheSection ^ Cache { System::Web::Configuration::CacheSection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取配置中包含的 节。

span.span: Gets the section contained within the configuration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象引用配置文件的 `cache` 节。The object refers to the `cache` section of the configuration file. 可以使用类以编程方式`cache`修改部分。You can use the class to modify the `cache` section programmatically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从现有 Web 应用程序的配置文件中获取该对象。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file of an existing Web application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup/CS/SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup/VB/SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象引用配置文件的 `outputCache` 节。The object refers to the `outputCache` section of the configuration file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从现有 Web 应用程序的配置文件中获取该对象。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file of an existing Web application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup/CS/SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup/VB/SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OutputCacheSettings As OutputCacheSettingsSection

summary.span: 获取配置中包含的 节。

span.span: Gets the section contained within the configuration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象引用配置文件的 `outputCacheSettings` 节。The object refers to the `outputCacheSettings` section of the configuration file. 输出缓存设置启用或禁用基于磁盘的永久性输出缓存, 定义用于保存要缓存的数据的位置, 并指定每个应用程序的缓存的最大大小。The output cache settings enable or disable disk-based persistent output cache, define the location for persisting the data to be cached, and specify the maximum size of the cache per application. ASP.NET 允许通过使用指令的特性并以编程方式使用类的属性和方法, 以声明方式缓存页面响应的多个版本。ASP.NET allows you to cache multiple versions of a page response declaratively by using attributes of the directive and programmatically using the properties and methods of the class. 可以通过使用 或类型配置应用程序来获得相同的结果。You can achieve the same results by configuring the application using the or the type. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从现有 Web 应用程序的配置文件中获取该对象。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file of an existing Web application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup/CS/SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup/VB/SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SqlCacheDependency As SqlCacheDependencySection

summary.span: 获取配置中包含的 节。

span.span: Gets the section contained within the configuration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象引用配置文件的 `sqlCacheDependency` 节。The object refers to the `sqlCacheDependency` section of the configuration file. SQL 缓存依赖关系在 ASP.NET 应用程序缓存中存储的项与特定 SQL Server 数据库表之间建立关系。The SQL cache dependency establishes a relationship between an item stored in an ASP.NET application's cache and a specific SQL Server database table. 类的实例必须监视表, 以便在表更改时, 将自动从缓存中删除该项。An instance of the class must monitor the table so that when the table changes the item will be automatically removed from the cache. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从现有 Web 应用程序的配置文件中获取该对象。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file of an existing Web application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup/CS/SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup/VB/SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.vb#5)]
